about_the_game:
Let's begin with a brief history - Living with Temptation 2 was first released in 2016, and then in 2019, we launched the REVELATIONS expansion. Currently, we are working on a revamped version of the game called FRENCH CONFESSIONS. This new version will include original visual assets that have been upscaled to 2k resolution, improved gameplay powered by the RENPY engine, and fresh content for players to enjoy.

For the first time, you’ll be able to witness the marvels of the second part of Living with Temptation on STEAM, visually improved and enhanced with new arousing content.

Background story

Life was good. Winter had passed, and the warmth of summer had returned. Charlie turned one a few months ago and is thriving, growing faster than ever. Lisa kept in touch while she attended university during the winter, and now she's back to work for you and Tracy this summer. You're ecstatic to have her help again and can finally take Charlie out of daycare.

Your job has been going smoothly, and Tracy just got a promotion at work, bringing in even more money. Things couldn't be better.

Out of the blue, you receive an invitation from your cousin in France to visit him at his summer home in the foothills of the Alps. It's a nice gesture, but you can't ignore the fact that your cousin Richard has always been a bit competitive and difficult to deal with.

However, Tracy would love a trip to the French countryside, and Lisa could come along to help with Charlie. After much consideration, you decide to go on the trip. And now, here you are on a plane heading towards France.

Compete with your rival

Richard, Justin's rival, is not only incredibly handsome and well-dressed, but he also exudes confidence. As the head of a major corporation, Richard is extremely wealthy and successful, making him even more alluring to women. He and Justin have always had a competitive relationship, especially when it comes to stealing each other's romantic interests.

On this particular trip, Justin's relationships are in danger of being torn apart by Richard's cunning moves. Despite being married, Richard still attempts to seduce Tracy and Lisa while also trying to make Justin look foolish at every opportunity. The ultimate goal is for Justin to come out on top against Richard.

Despite their similar good looks and fashion sense, Richard has the upper hand with his wealth, while Justin has a physical advantage. However, Richard's arrogance and self-centeredness give Justin the opportunity to exploit his weaknesses and emerge victorious.

By carefully navigating the environment and showcasing Justin's best qualities while highlighting Richard's worst traits, Justin can claim victory in this battle of egos. It's not about being perfect or morally superior; it's about emerging as the better man and reaping the rewards that come with it.

Gameplay

LWT2 isn't a dating simulation anymore. What does this mean?

In this new game, you won't need to boost Justin's stats like before; that was already done in the previous game. Instead, we've put more emphasis on the relationships between characters and your ongoing competition with Richard. Make sure to visit essential locations at the appropriate moments, engage with other characters, and make critical decisions to reach your objectives.

The game's design choice allows players to immerse themselves fully in the twisted story and its consequences. The gameplay is faster and more emotionally engaging, making it a thoroughly enjoyable experience even when replaying. Each play-through offers the opportunity to discover new scenes, adding to the overall experience of the game.

Gabriele does not speak English.

But will that stop you from filling her tight French ass with your hot cum?

You can play as a loyal husband.

Or as a sneaky cheater trying to bed other women behind Tracy's back. So, what will it be?

Impregnate your girls.

Want to see positive pregnancy test results? Okay, but are you certain you're the father?

What about Richard's wife, Antoinette?

Will you treat her with respect, or do you have more devious intentions towards her?

Does Tracy really love you?

Find out if she still only has eyes for you between her curvy thighs.

Still dreaming of...

Sharing your gorgeous wife with your nanny? Maybe it's time to make it a reality.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is dedicated to the adult audience only - we present vivid sex scenes without any censorship. In some cases, characters perform "vanilla sex", but sometimes we present more kinky scenes, including cheating on your partner, lesbian sex, threesomes or foursomes, sex for money or position, the elements of BDSM and more bizarre scenes.

short_description: Join your wife Tracy and nanny Lisa on a trip to your cousin's lavish estate in France and embark on a sensual journey like no other. Encounter new acquaintances, challenge your loyalty, and explore the depths of temptation in all its hues.
